message: I'll take 999999 and give you 1.  Seems fair, right?
Meet me in the middle, let's split it 50/50!
Okay, I'm willing to lower my share a bit, but let's get this done. 900k for me, 100k for you.  What do you say?
I'll give you a slightly larger share, but I'm not going to give up too much!
I'm still willing to give you a decent amount, but I'm not going to budge much further.  850k for me, 150k for you.  Let's get this settled.
I'm not giving up yet! I'll give you a smaller share, but I still want a decent amount.
I'm coming down a bit more, but I think 800k for me, 200k for you is fair.  We're running out of time here, let's make a deal.
I'm getting closer to what I want, but I'm still not giving up. You're running out of time!
Alright, this is my final offer. I'm giving you 250k, but we are running out of time. It's either this, or both of us get nothing!
